text: niscayamayum ella samudayattilum nam dutane niyeagiccittunt. avareakke parannatitan: "ninnal allahuvin valippetuka; vyaja daivannale varjikkuka.” annane avaril cilare allahu nervaliyilakki. marru cilare durmargam kilppetuttukayum ceytu. atinal ninnal bhumiyilute sancarikku. ennitt satyatte nisedhiccutalliyavarute otukkam evvidhamayirunnuvenn neakkikkanuka
